name: 100 All-Time Favorites
description:
A collection of classic puzzle, board, and card games in an electronic format similar to Clubhouse Games. The cart contains the following games:

  • Backgammon
  • Bridge
  • Blackjack
  • Texas Hold'em Poker
  • Hearts
  • Chinese Checkers
  • Draughts
  • Flip Flop
  • Go
  • Straight 5
  • Rummy
  • Chess
  • Dominoes
  • De-code
  • Mancala
  • Jackpot
  • Pool
  • Paddle Play
  • Kakuro
  • Straight 4
  • Table Hockey
  • Sudoku
  • Solitaire
  • Bowling
  • Battlefield
  • Roulette
  • Tic Tac Toe
  • Classic Mines
  • Rush 3
  • Shapes
  • Dicey
  • Beanstalk
  • Code Winder
  • Tentacle
  • Tri-Match
  • Crown Fall
  • Bi-Contract
  • Hunt Heart
  • Dance Floor
  • Three Throw
  • Plus twenty more games which need to be unlocked by points the player earns from playing the other games.
gamePlay: Board game, Cards / tiles, Casino / gambling, Chess
